history.proof: intros H. hauto use: is_derive_unique unfold: ex_derive.

exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R x : R H0 : forall (f0 : ?U -> ?V) (x0 : ?U), ex_filterdiff f0 (locally x0) -> continuous f0 x0 x0 : R H2 : forall x1 : R, is_filter_lim (locally x) x1 -> is_domin (locally x) (fun y : R => minus y x1) (fun y : R => minus (minus (f y) (f x1)) (scal (minus y x1) x0)) linear_plus0 : forall x y : R, scal (plus x y) x0 = plus (scal x x0) (scal y x0) linear_scal0 : forall k x : R, scal (scal k x) x0 = scal k (scal x x0) x1 : R H1 : 0 < x1 H3 : forall x : R, norm (scal x x0) <= x1 * norm x Unable to unify "Derive ?M4870 ?M4871 = ?M4872" with "is_linear (fun y : R => scal y (Lim (fun h : R => (f (x + h) - f x) / h) 0))".

original: intros H. unfold is_derive, Derive. intros [l Hd]. apply filterdiff_continuous in Hd. apply is_derive_unique. auto.
